1/4

Hi Coder !

You have a mission to accomplish today. In this game you must collect all lost API's that were crucial for your next big coding project. But beware it's not easy! In your way you will encounter some annoying bugs that might send you back to the start point.

Jump carefully cause death pits will also do the same. But this is not it, there is another big issue that we need to look after. Some API's look the same as a normal one but are not real. If you acquire a fake API then your score will reduce. And you will lose this game if your score goes below 500. So what are you waiting for, start running..!!

2/4

Player Movement

Use left, up and right arrow keys or 'a','w' and 'd' keys to control your player's movements.

Note: if the acquired API turns out to be fake then same amount to be gained would get deducted from the score. So choose the API at your own risk. Moreover everytime you restart the game, each API would get randomly assigned as fake or real.(eg if Youtube API is fake then -100 instead of +100.)

3/4

Avoid Bugs and Death Pits

Use up or 'w' key to dodge bugs and death pits. You can also kill bugs by jumping over them. If you fall into a death pit or collide with a bug, you would have to start again.
